title: FitGenius: The AI Architect

look.grade: Cool cyberpunk blues transitioning to warm organic golds
look.grain: Fine 35mm film grain, high contrast, volumetric lighting

continuity.texture_alignment: Digital wireframes morph seamlessly into human muscle fiber and then into fabric
continuity.motion_vector_continuity: Continuous fluid forward camera movement, spiraling around the subject

camera.movement: Camera starts inside a glowing blue data stream. It accelerates forward, the data stream weaves together to become the red muscle fibers of a human arm. The camera pulls back and spirals around a man performing a heavy deadlift. As he lifts, the environment around him constructs itself from a dark void into a sun-drenched, high-end futuristic gym. The camera settles on his face, now sweating and focused, as a holographic 'GIGI' logo materializes in his eye reflection.

environment: Abstract void of floating binary code and glowing geometry
Code solidifies into a human anatomical structure (muscles, tendons) glowing with energy
The surroundings burst into reality: concrete floor, glass walls, morning sunlight
subject: A man initially appears as a silhouette of data
Becomes a translucent anatomical model showing perfect form mechanics
Finally resolves into a photorealistic athlete in premium sportswear
He completes a powerful, perfect deadlift rep at the climax

lighting.time_of_day: Transition from Digital Night to Golden Hour Morning
lighting.style: dramatic rim lighting, changing from neon blue (AI) to natural warm sunlight (Reality)

sound_effects: Digital glitching and high-speed data processing hum
Heavy breathing and heartbeat syncing with a bass drop
The satisfying metallic 'clack' of weights hitting the floor
Ethereal choir swell as the sunlight hits

scene_notes: The key visual metaphor is 'Construction'. FitGenius isn't just watching; it is BUILDING the perfect athlete. The transition from code to muscle to reality must be liquid and invisible, feeling like magic.
